Class FriendSupportingHandler<T extends de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.NBTHandler<T>
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.FriendSupportingHandler<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockNBTHandler, PlayerSettingsHandler
public abstract class FriendSupportingHandler<T extends de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound> extends NBTHandler<T>
The backbone of any handler that supports adding a list of friends/players.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final UUID
    publicUuid
    Mojang recently started requiring zeroed UUIDs to *not* be used, so we instead use an invalid UUID

  • Field Details

    • publicUuid

      public static final UUID publicUuid
      Mojang recently started requiring zeroed UUIDs to *not* be used, so we instead use an invalid UUID

  • Method Details

    • preFriendReadCallback

      protected void preFriendReadCallback()
      A function called before friends are read from this NBT compound. Useful for remapping old data to this new structure.

    • getFriendsStream

      public Stream<FriendHandler> getFriendsStream()
      Gets a Stream of FriendHandler for this block.
      Returns:
      A stream of friend handlers for all NBT compounds under the friend key.

    • getFriends

      public List<FriendHandler> getFriends()
      Gets a List of FriendHandler for this block.

    • setFriends

      public void setFriends(@NotNull @NotNull List<FriendHandler> friends)
      Set a new list of FriendHandler for the friends list.

    • getFriend

      @NotNull public @NotNull Optional<FriendHandler> getFriend(@NotNull @NotNull String id)
      Filters the results of getFriends() for any entry whose UUID qualifies for String.equals(Object) with given id. If the given id is not a friend of this block, this might return the FriendHandler which represents all players.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID to check for.
      Returns:
      The first FriendHandler found, or none.

    • addFriend

      public void addFriend(@NotNull @NotNull String friend)
      Adds a new friend to the NBT.

    • containsFriend

      public boolean containsFriend(@NotNull @NotNull String friendUuid)
      Checks whether this blocks friends contain given friendUuid.
      See Also:
      • containsFriend(Stream, String)

    • containsFriend

      public boolean containsFriend(@NotNull @NotNull Stream<FriendHandler> friends, @NotNull @NotNull String friendUuid)
      Checks whether friends contains friend.
      Parameters:
      friends - A list of all friends we want to filter.
      friendUuid - The UUID of a player we want to check for.
      Returns:
      True, if the list does contain that friend.
